gui
Class ComponentPin

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              gui.Displayable
                  gui.ComponentPin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ComponentPin
extends Displayable

ComponentPin extends Displayable and is the gui representation of an input/output pin.

Author:
Daniel Stahl, Kevin Wellwood
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ComponentPin

public ComponentPin(Gui gui,
                    java.awt.Point location,
                    ComponentImage owner,
                    int pinType,
                    int pinNumber)
Constructs a new ComponentPin object, given a component image that owns it, a pin type, pin number and location in the sandbox. The pin type must be either INPUT_PIN or OUTPUT_PIN. The location must be in standard coordinates.

Parameters:
gui - the gui
location - the center of the pin, relative to the owner
owner - the component image to which this pin belongs
pinType - the type of pin (an input or an output)
pinNumber - the pin number on the owner component

Identifies ComponentPin objects as the COMPONENT_PIN type of Displayable.
